message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $13,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
